attributes.action: Re-instate Professor David Nutt, sack Alan Johnson and make policy based on facts, not opinion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government of the day work to help the people of the day and to prevent harm. By forcing the resignation of Professor David Nutt, the government are failing to acknowledge the real risks of substances based on scientific fact. As the government actually works for us, they need to base policy on true scientific facts and not opinion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
